title: New: BANKS – Change (Jensen Sportag Remix)
body:
Oh boy, this is a good remix.

 Nashville duo **Jensen Sportag** take the knife to _Change_, by BBC Sound of 2014 nominee **BANKS**. Turning what originally comes across as an ode to victims of domestic abuse, into a late night chillout session, it’s the best remix of the year thus far, maintaing the sincerity that made the LA songstresses version so appealing in the first place.
